commenter_a: Let me offer you, @username, some unsolicited and unqualified advice since I'm not a politician. There is no way you should be neck and neck with Bernie Sanders. But you're playing weak. Marriages often dissolve over a hint of unfaithfulness and unforgiveness. Only the extremely strong can take a mistake made by a spouse to demonstrate their character. If I'm not mistaken this is Sanders' second wife and 'The Donald' has had three wives and several affairs. How many times have you been married?
